name: HTML Video Poker
description:
The world is burning! A solar flare has knocked out transformers and the internet is down for a while... Times got hard; But then... You find an old phone and a solar charger, it has a browser! Did you remember to bring your HTML Video Poker?

☺Self contained video poker... Download now. ☻

Don't like it? It's copyleft software my dude! Your'e gonna have to JavaScript, here's the rules real clear like: https://github.com/digitaldesigndj/javascript-video-poker/blob/master/src/js/poker.js#L253 Got a problem with that? Fork me here: https://github.com/digitaldesigndj/javascript-video-poker

Enjoy! It's fun, realize how bad you are at this before you get to Vegas!
